tools.name: get_error_events
tools.description: Get error events from the monitoring system

arguments.name: limit
arguments.description: Maximum number of events to return

tools.name: get_performance_metrics
tools.description: Get performance metrics from the monitoring system

content.text:
{
  "project": "my-web-app",
  "timeframe": "24h",
  "total_events": 15,
  "events": [
    {
      "id": "err_123456",
      "type": "Exception",
      "message": "Database connection failed",
      "timestamp": "2025-03-11T15:30:45Z",
      "count": 5,
      "last_seen": "2025-03-11T18:45:12Z",
      "stack_trace": "Error: Database connection failed\n    at connectToDatabase (/app/src/db.js:45:12)\n    at processRequest (/app/src/api.js:23:8)\n    at handleRequest (/app/src/server.js:67:10)",
      "environment": "production",
      "user_count": 3
    },
    {
      "id": "err_789012",
      "type": "TypeError",
      "message": "Cannot read property 'data' of undefined",
      "timestamp": "2025-03-11T12:15:30Z",
      "count": 8,
      "last_seen": "2025-03-11T20:10:05Z",
      "stack_trace": "TypeError: Cannot read property 'data' of undefined\n    at processResponse (/app/src/api.js:78:23)\n    at handleResponse (/app/src/server.js:112:15)",
      "environment": "production",
      "user_count": 6
    },
    {
      "id": "err_345678",
      "type": "RangeError",
      "message": "Maximum call stack size exceeded",
      "timestamp": "2025-03-11T09:45:18Z",
      "count": 2,
      "last_seen": "2025-03-11T10:12:33Z",
      "stack_trace": "RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded\n    at recursiveFunction (/app/src/utils.js:156:12)\n    at recursiveFunction (/app/src/utils.js:158:10)",
      "environment": "production",
      "user_count": 1
    }
  ]
}

{
  "target": "example.com",
  "scan_type": "quick",
  "timestamp": "2025-03-11T22:30:00Z",
  "scan_id": "scan_123456",
  "status": "completed",
  "duration_seconds": 45,
  "findings": [
    {
      "id": "vuln_123",
      "type": "SSL/TLS",
      "name": "Outdated SSL protocol",
      "description": "The server supports TLS 1.0, which is outdated and has known vulnerabilities.",
      "severity": "medium",
      "cvss_score": 5.4,
      "recommendation": "Disable TLS 1.0 and 1.1, and only enable TLS 1.2 and 1.3."
    },
    {
      "id": "vuln_456",
      "type": "HTTP Headers",
      "name": "Missing security headers",
      "description": "The server is missing important security headers such as Content-Security-Policy and X-XSS-Protection.",
      "severity": "low",
      "cvss_score": 3.2,
      "recommendation": "Add appropriate security headers to all HTTP responses."
    },
    {
      "id": "vuln_789",
      "type": "Open Ports",
      "name": "Unnecessary open ports",
      "description": "The server has unnecessary ports open, including 21 (FTP) and 23 (Telnet).",
      "severity": "high",
      "cvss_score": 7.5,
      "recommendation": "Close unnecessary ports and only expose required services."
    }
  ],
  "summary": {
    "total_findings": 3,
    "critical": 0,
    "high": 1,
    "medium": 1,
    "low": 1,
    "info": 0
